description: A sample contains information on the biosample that was sequenced or imaged.  This includes donor, body part, and anything that comes between removing the sample from a body and the assay.

^characteristics_.*$.description: FIelds that begin with sample.characteristics_ can contain any value, and the field name can be anything after the prefix

title: sample from organism

body_part.description: A more detailed position within the body than the term given in the organ field.

organ.description: The organ that the sample came from.  "Blood" and "connective tissue" count as organs.

preservation.description: State of body_part at collection and how it was preserved after removal.

protocol_ids.description: Array of protocol IDs from project.protocols used for this sample.
